author: Cao, YX; Liu, J
adress: Anhui Univ Tradit Chinese Med TCM, Affiliated Hsop 1, Dept Rheumatol, Hefei, Anhui, Peoples R China
title: A Novel Chinese Medicine, Xinfeng Capsule, Modulates Proinflammatory Cytokines via Regulating the Toll-Like Receptor 4 (TLR4)/Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase (MAPK)/Nuclear Kappa B (NF-kappa B) Signaling Pathway in an Adjuvant Arthritis Rat Model
